fields.name: Passives:
fields.value: - Shipment: During every Night Event, you may choose 1 non-Special card to gain. [Activates D3]

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Exotify: Choose 1 card in your Hand. You are unable to play it, discard it, or move it in any way for 2 phases. Once the two phases are up, the card will become (Upgraded). [2 uses, 2 CD]
- Replicate: Choose a non-Special card in your Hand. Duplicate it, with modifiers. [1 use, Unique]
- Procure: Choose 2 non-Special cards to draw this phase. It will replace your regular draw. [2 uses, 3 CD, Unique]
